inclusion.criterion: Histological or cytological proof of urothelial carcinoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age > 18 years at the time of consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Written informed consent and HIPAA authorization for release of personal health information
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Prior Autoimmune disease: Patients with a history of inflammatory bowel disease, including ulcerative colitis and Crohn's Disease
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: No active CNS metastases. Subjects with neurological symptoms must undergo a head CT scan or brain MRI to exclude brain metastasis.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has lower urinary tract symptoms and IPSS score of 15, but no history of autoimmune disease or active CNS metastases.
